::Fenox::

Fenox looks down at the wolf creature as it walks up to her and 
presses against her thigh. She scratches it absently behind the ear 
and looks at Vlad again.

"Well, I don't know about anyone named Von, but the datatracks of the 
ship have information on Megatron's crew, if you want to see that."





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Carnage Blood" <Carnage@d...> wrote:
> ** Vlad looked down at Fenox as she turned towards him, wondering 
what a large wolflike creature would want with a smaller fembot like 
her. She wasn't ugly but he wasn't interested either. However, Shesta 
seemed to like her.
> The dog/wolf creature padded towards Fenox slightly and moved to 
press her snout on the femms thigh, since that was her sign which 
indicated that she wanted to be petted.
> Vlad, on the other hand, simply ignored what Shesta was doing and 
went forward with his words. 
> However, it might prove wiser to try and find out if this woman 
knew anything about Von and if he was still alive. There was no point 
in getting a hitman if his brother had passed on.
> Vlad cleared his throat and leaned in towards Fenox ever so 
slightly.** " I'm looking for my older brother, Von. From what I 
remember of him he's tall and fierce in appearance. I was wondering 
if you knew him or where he's located."   *** Vlad leaned back a bit, 
his optics still trained upon Fenox.** " If it's any help he was one 
of the first to crash here with Megatron. After participating in the 
Golden Disc theft."
> ** He hoped that she would know who he was talking about, it was 
much more easier then trying to search for his spark signature. Which 
would be like looking for a needle in a haystack.**
>
